keys.string: With the semester starting you move into your dorms and meet some of the other residence of the dorm. The game will not progress until you speak to the 4 residence.
You walk up to room 142 and see a small whiteboard hanging on the outside. The board has a elaborate drawing of a butterfly on it and the name Ryn. You should greet your new neighbors so you knock.

ArrayOfString.string: [Narrator][Dialog]With the semester starting you move into your dorms and meet some of the other residence of the dorm. The game will not progress until you speak to the 4 residence.

[Narrator][Dialog]You walk up to room 142 and see a small whiteboard hanging on the outside. The board has a elaborate drawing of a butterfly on it and the name Ryn. You should greet your new neighbors so you knock.
